Layout/HashAlignment.description:
Description

Align the elements of a hash literal if they span more than one line.
Layout/HashAlignment.option:
This rule supports the following parameters in your configuration:

AllowMultipleStyles: True (type: bool)
EnforcedHashRocketStyle: key (type: str)
SupportedHashRocketStyles: ['key', 'separator', 'table'] (type: list)
EnforcedColonStyle: key (type: str)
SupportedColonStyles: ['key', 'separator', 'table'] (type: list)
EnforcedLastArgumentHashStyle: always_inspect (type: str)
SupportedLastArgumentHashStyles: ['always_inspect', 'always_ignore', 'ignore_implicit', 'ignore_explicit'] (type: list)
